title: What building is being constructed on the east side of highway 17 south, located opposite the Comfort Suites Hotel, on the western side of highway 17 south?  (Both sites are near the Maganolia Greens complex in Leland).
text: Hello. There's a Best Western motel under construction and should be completed soon. Here's a link to a recent story about motel development in Leland. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20091119/ARTICLES/911194008?p=2
